CHAT.comment: Home Visit 2; living room floor; mid-afternoon

u.a: the sound from Chi dumping toys out drowns out the rest of the sentence
keeps Bro in her lap and gets on the floor
looking at the necklace that Chi is holding in his mouth
takes the other phone and shows him how to pick up receiver
dials as he says each number
mimics high pitched and loud voice used by Chi
starts putting people in the bus
throws a people piece to Chi
puts Bro in rocking seat behind her and rocks it with hand behind her while she plays with Chi
has bus on the other side of the living room
driving bus across the living room
walking over towards Mot like a monster
looks at book and INV1 through kaleidoscope
walking like a monster towards Mot and looking really close at her through kaleidoscope
puts on necklace and looks at INV2
driving bus around living room floor
takes people out of the bus and opens tea pot
points to other side of living room .
points to another part of living room
